nodes.text: Conraad Om'wurt was a male Human beastmaster living during the Galactic War. By 3630 BBY he became known as the gladiator in the Arena Grand of Zakuul. That year, Om'wurt was put up against a newcomer known as "the Mysterious Stranger". During the fight in the Arena, he was assisted by his trained K'lor'slug Chompers the Undying, but was defeated in the fourth round of the Arena fights.
Conraad Om'wurt appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as the fourth boss of the "Eternal Championship."
